section.title: JavaScriptObject
section.para: Allows for the use of the JavaScript programming language to create score data. Uses the built-in JavaScript interpreter (Nashorn) to interpret JavaScript scripts.
After writing your script to generate notes, you'll have to bring back into Blue by assigning the variable 'score' the text string of the generated JavaScript score.
